DOC.brief_title: Insulinotropic Effect of GIP and GLP-1 Before and After Reduced Glucose Tolerance
DOC.detailed_description: The incretin effect in patients with type two diabetes is reduced. The investigators have previously shown that it is possible to induce a defect in the incretin effect in healthy individuals. The purpose of this study is to evaluate the insulinotropic affect of the incretin hormones in healthy individuals before and after a deterioration of the glucose homeostasis. The evaluation is done by infusing GIP, GLP-1 or saline during hyperglycemic clamps.
